projects.mainTitle: Town of Crawford – 250,000 Gallon Storage Tank
mainContent: WestWater Engineering designed an above ground 250,000-gallon welded steel water storage tank based on volumetric criteria for raw water supply and is configured to maintain the transmission main filled regardless of springs output or water demands in the distribution system.
The tank site is very remote and has no utility service available for conventional level controls and accessory items.
